title: Font of the Vimeo.com logo
content:
[http://vimeo.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623045850/http:/vimeo.com/ "http://vimeo.com/")

The Vimeo Logo font.  
Just a beautiful font (to me at least). But I don't know who made it and where I may find it.  
Thank you for your help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [vimeo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623045850/http:/typophile.com/files/vimeo.jpg) | 12.28 KB |
author: logicalnot

comments.content: Looks custom to me, you might like Underware's [Bello](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623045850/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=bello&id2=overview)or Village's [Galaxie Cassiopeia](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623045850/http:/www.vllg.com/Village/GalaxieCassiopeia/mudTyper+Weights/).

Ok \_ I will find my way with your (greats !) links.  
Thank you.
